actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to House from the Committee on the Judiciary, H. Rept. 96-969.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure laid on table in House (Provisions inserted in S. 2511 as passed House).

official_title: A bill to amend section 106 of the Civil Rights Act of 1957 to authorize appropriations for the Commission on Civil Rights for the fiscal year 1981.
short_title: Civil Rights Commission Authorization Act of 1980
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Civil Rights Commission Authorization Act of 1980 - Amends the Civil Rights Act of 1957 to authorize appropriations for the Commission on Civil Rights for fiscal year 1981.

titles.title: Civil Rights Commission Authorization Act of 1980
A bill to amend section 106 of the Civil Rights Act of 1957 to authorize appropriations for the Commission on Civil Rights for the fiscal year 1981.
